us.phonetic: /ˈʌpˌdeɪt; v. also ˌʌpˈdeɪt/, (v. up dāt′, up′dāt′; n. up′dāt′)

example.eg: We will update the list tonight.
We will update the web site tonight.
We'll update you when your order is ready.  Let's go for a drink at the weekend and I'll update you on all the latest news.
example.egtrans: 我们会在您订单准备好的时候，为您提供最新消息。我们周末去喝一场吧，届时我会告诉你所有最新进展。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为…提供最新消息，告诉…最新进展

example.eg: The update of the website took six months to prepare.
example.egtrans: 网站更新花了六个月的准备时间。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 更新, 刷新…的内容, 使现代化

example.eg: We're still waiting for an update from the company's spokesperson.
example.egtrans: 我们还在等公司的发言人提供最新消息。

us.phonetic: /ˈʌpˌdeɪt; v. also ˌʌpˈdeɪt/, (v. up dāt′, up′dāt′; n. up′dāt′)

example.eg: The new version of the book includes an update at the end.
example.egtrans: 这本书的新版在末尾有一份补编。

example.eg: The latest update will be released in fifteen days.
example.egtrans: 最新修正版将在15天内发布。

example.eg: We updated the house after moving in.
example.egtrans: 搬进去之后，我们翻新了这幢房子。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使...现代化, 使...跟上时代, 翻新

us.phonetic: /ˈʌpˌdeɪt; v. also ˌʌpˈdeɪt/, (v. up dāt′, up′dāt′; n. up′dāt′)
